text: This is a list of regions of Saudi Arabia by Human Development Index as of 2020 with data for the year 2018. {| class="wikitable sortable" !Rank !Region (provinces) !HDI (2018) !Comparable countries (2018) |- ! colspan="4" style="color:090;" |Very high human development |- |1 |Center (Riyadh, Al- Qassim) |0.880 | |- |2 |North (Northern Borders, Al Jawf, Ha'il) |0.871 |, |- style="background:#e6e6e6" |– | (average) |0.857 |, |- |3 |West (Mecca, Medina, Tabuk) |0.853 | |- |4 |Eastern province |0.844 |, |- |5 |South (Al Bahah, Jizan, 'Asir, Najran) |0.837 | |} == See also == * List of countries by Human Development Index == References == Human Development Index Saudi Arabia Saudi Arabia
title: List of regions of Saudi Arabia by Human Development Index
